name: 2025 the 9th International Conference on Innovation in Artificial Intelligence
content: Publication: After a careful reviewing process, select papers from the conference after proper registration and presentation, will be published in Lecture Notes in Electrical Engineering as a proceedings book volume. Springer will conduct quality checks on the accepted papers and only papers that pass these checks will be published. Indexed by SCOPUS and EI Compendex. All books published in the series are submitted for consideration in Web of Science.
